DOC.HEAD: U.S. Firm Boosts Stake in Blue Arrow
DOC.TEXT: Blue Arrow PLC, the world's largest employment services group, said Wednesday that Southeastern Asset Management of the United States had boosted its stake to 8.4 percent from 7.16 percent. Blue Arrow said it has been informed that Southeastern now holds 6 million American Depositary Shares, which represents 60.2 million of Blue Arrow's outstanding shares. Southeastern Asset Management acquired its initial stake in September. At the time, Blue Arrow chairman Mitchell Fromstein said the company welcomed its shareholding, and said it was a friendly investment. Fromstein also said that he wouldn't have been bothered if the American company had taken a bigger stake.
